loyality.description: Current loyalty level if Epoch ended today
loyality.button: How to increase your loyalty level?

loyalityLevels.title: Loyalty levels
loyalityLevels.description-1: KSU Token Loyalty Locked KSU tokens provide additional benefits at various loyalty levels. These are as follows:
loyalityLevels.description-2: Normal yields stated in each pool are received, and deposit/withdrawal requests are processed after Loyalty level 1 and 2 stakers.

level-1.description: Locking at least 1% of the user’s deposit balance on the platform in KSU Tokens provides:
level-1.prop-1: Second priority for deposits into pools.
level-1.prop-2: Second priority for capital withdrawals at the end of each Epoch.
level-1.prop-3: Launch bonus: 0.1% extra yield in all pools, paid in KSU tokens.

level-2.description: Locking at least 5% of the user’s deposit balance on the platform in KSU Tokens provides:
level-2.prop-1: First priority for deposits into pools.
level-2.prop-2: First priority for capital withdrawals at the end of each Epoch.
level-2.prop-3: Launch bonus: 0.2% extra yield in all pools, paid in KSU tokens

estimates.title: Estimates
estimates.est-1: Deposit value in USD at current exchange rate
estimates.est-4: Projected USDC earning at current APY

reviewLock.depositSchedule: Deposit will be scheduled to the end of the current epoch
